product_name: eGear LED Tag-It Safety Light - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Clipped to you or your dog, the eGear Tag-It safety light gives you affordable and easily wearable visibility that is both tough and lightweight. Convenient carabiner-clip design attaches with ease-just clip and go. Bright LED is visible up to 2 mi. away; steady-on mode offers up to 100 hrs. and flashing mode offers up to 250 hrs. The eGear Tag-It safety light is waterproof to 300 ft. Closeout.
short_description: Clipped to you or your dog, the eGear Tag-It safety light gives you affordable and easily wearable visibility that is both tough and lightweight.
